testcase.name: To verify user able to login in Adactin website
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Adactin Login Page.....................................passed When User enters "Testaarthiramky5555" and "test@1234"Standard..............passed And User clicks on Login button.............................................passed Then User logged in and verify welcome message..............................passed

testcase.name: Verify user selects the details and navigates to Search result page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on the Search Hotel Page......................................passed When User selects "Sydney", "Hotel Sunshine", "Standard", "1", "2" and "1"..passed And User clicks on Search Page..............................................passed Then User navigates to Select User Page.....................................passed When User selects from the search result....................................passed And User clicks on Continue button..........................................passed Then User navigates to Book a Hotel Page....................................passed

Given User is on the Book Hotel Page........................................passed When User enters or selects "Aarthi", "Vinod", "C33 TVH Rozalia", "2345678909875432","VISA","March", "2022" and "6754".passed And User clicks on Book Now button..........................................passed Then User navigates to Booking Confirmation Page and OrderID is generated...passed
